pages.title: Crystal Ore
pages.text: $(crystal_ore) can be mined to obtain $(br)$(crystals), which are vital in $(br)$(sorcerycraft). $(br2)They can be seen in caves between Height $(bold)23$() and $(bold)72$() in size of $(bold)5 ores$() per veins. $(br2)In $(sorcerycraft), $(crystal_ore) can usually be found when venturing in the caves.

pages.title: Crystal ores vein
pages.text: $(crystal_ore) in its natural form, in a cave.
